name: Ninja Run2
description:
What we are:

Ninja Run 2  is the second game of the classic series ninja run. An addictive role-playing action Game. You will play as a ninja, run and jump freely in the world. The ninja will keep running all the time. the game fails when you hit a wall. You can choose to jump or slide or make some interaction with the game props. There are also enemies in each level. Those dark ninja will attack you or throw ninja darts. Be careful with these dark ninjas.

What’s new:

additional 14 levels.

2 new enemies and 4 new items were added.

hundreds of animation and items for collection.

improve graphic and more sound effects

Features of ninja run 2:
A shadow run stickman game.
A ninja running action game with dark sword
Shadow style cartoon graphics.
running and jumping freely in the dark world
